data.title: English Translation) — BTS
data.text:
또 져버린 것 같아

I think I lost again

넌 화가 나 보여

You look angry

아른대는 Game over over over

A lingering Game over over over

만약 게임이라면

If this were a game

또 load하면 되겠지만

I could just load it over again

I guess I gotta deal with this

deal with this

Real world

차라리 게임이면 좋겠지

I’d rather this be a game instead

너무 아프니까

Because it hurts so much

I need to heal my medic

But I’m another star

완벽하지 못했던 나를 탓해

I blame the imperfect me

Brake in my head

brake in my step always

그저 잘하고 싶었고

I just wanted to be good to you

웃게 해주고 싶었는데 damn

And to make you laugh, but damn

Please give me a remedy

멈춰버린 심장을 뛰게 할 remedy

That will make my stopped heart beat again, a remedy

이제 어떻게 해야 해

What should I do now?

날 살려줘 다시 기회를 줘

Save me, give me another chance

Please give me a

A remedy a melody

오직 내게만 남겨질 그 memory

One that will be left only for me, that memory

이쯤에서 그만하면

If I stopped at this point

꺼버리면 모든 게 다 편해질까

If I turned it off, would everything become easier?

괜찮지만 괜찮지 않아

It’s alright but it’s not alright

익숙하다고 혼잣말했지만

Though I told myself that I’ve gotten used to it

늘 처음인 것처럼 아파

It still hurts like the first time

부족한 gamer

An inadequate gamer

맞아 날 control 못하지

That’s right, I can’t control myself

계속 아파 ‘Cause

It continues to hurt ‘Cause

시행착오와 오만 가지

Trial and error and every possible thing

내 노래 가사 몸짓 하나

My every song, lyric, and movement

말 한마디 다

Every word I say

내 미시감에 무서워지고

I become afraid of the jamais vu

또 늘 도망가려 해

And I try once again to run away

But 잡네 그래도 네가

But still, you catch me

내 그림자는 커져가도

Even if my shadow grows bigger

내 삶과 넌 equal sign

My life and you are an equal sign

So 내 remedy는 your remedy

So my remedy is your remedy

Please give me a remedy

멈춰버린 심장을 뛰게 할 remedy

That will make my stopped heart beat again, a remedy

이제 어떻게 해야 해

What should I do now?

날 살려줘 다시 기회를 줘

Save me, give me another chance

Please give me a

Remedy

또 다시 뛰고 또 넘어지고

Running again, falling again

Honestly

수없이 반복된대도

Even if it repeats countless times over

난 또 뛸 거라고

I will still run again

Please give me a remedy

멈춰버린 심장을 뛰게 할 remedy

That will make my stopped heart beat again, a remedy

이제 어떻게 해야 해

What should I do now?

날 살려줘 다시 기회를 줘

Save me, give me another chance

Please give me a

Remedy (성공인가 돌아왔어)

Remedy (Did I succeed? I’m back)

멈춰버린 심장을 뛰게 할 (집중해서 꼭 네게 닿고 말겠어)

That will make my stopped heart beat again (I’ll concentrate and make sure to reach you one day)

remedy (떨어지고 넘어지고)

remedy (Falling down and falling over)

이제 어떻게 해야 해 (익숙한 아픔이 똑같이 날 덮쳐)

What should I do now? (The familiar pain strikes me once again)

날 살려줘 (이번에도 쉽지 않아)

Save me (It’s not easy this time around either)

다시 기회를 줘 (관둘 거냐고 No no never)

Give me another chance (Am I ever quitting? No no never)
